backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the FloatingHearts component adjustment (opacity, distribution, count 30–45) to its source file and test ID REQ-11.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Romantic Birthday Website that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing a multi-step state machine (intro through final) with timed auto-transitions, user interaction handlers, and conditional rendering of FloatingHearts, FlowerRain, and BalloonAnimation layers.
frontend/src/components/BalloonAnimation: Renders 25 randomized balloons rising from the bottom of the viewport using a balloon-rise CSS animation; conditionally shown via a visible prop.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders 40 heart images distributed across the full viewport with high opacity (0.55–0.90), negative animation delays for immediate visibility, and randomized size, speed, drift, and rotation; hidden when visible is false.
frontend/src/components/FlowerRain.tsx: Renders 40 flower petals falling from the top of the screen with randomized horizontal positions, sizes, speeds, and rotations; conditionally shown via a visible prop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor via React Query, recreating it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend React Query hooks are needed for this frontend-only application.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a romantic rose/cream/gold color palette using OKLCH, and declares reusable component classes for buttons and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom romantic fonts (Playfair, Dancing Script, Lato), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, and box shadows, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 5) describing a premium romantic birthday single-page app with a multi-step interactive flow, listing existing implemented features, architectural notes, and known issues.
